pricing.title: Amanani alula, acacile
pricing.subtitle: Awekho amakhasimende afihlekile. Ungakhansela noma nini.
pricing.cta: Qala ukuhlolwa kwakho kwamahhala kwezinsuku eziyi-14

hero.title: Imiphumela eqinisekisiwe nezinsiza zokusheshisa ukwethulwa kwakho kwe-WhatsApp
hero.subtitle: Bona ukuthi izinhlangano ezilawulwa ziqhuba kanjani i-WhatsApp Bot Builder bese ulanda ama-playbook esiwasebenzisa ezinhlelweni zangempela.

partners.title: Kusetshenziswa
partners.subtitle: Amaqembu emikhakheni yezempilo, ezokuthengisa ne-SaaS e-EU
partners.description: Ama-squad e-Compliance, CX ne-Growth asebenzisa i-WhatsApp Bot Builder njengesisekelo se-automation stack yawo.

caseStudies.title: Imiphumela emsulwa kubahlanganyeli bethu
caseStudies.subtitle: Icala ngalinye lihlanganisa ukuhambisana ne-GDPR, izindlela eziphephile zokukhokha kanye nama-analytics agxile kuma-KPI.

healthcare.title: I-triage ezenzakalelayo ezibhedlela eziyisikhombisa
healthcare.description: Izicelo zeziguli zihlukaniswa kusenesikhathi, zithunyelwa eqenjini elifanele futhi zigcinwe ngaphandle komsebenzi wesandla.
healthcare.result: Ukulawulwa kwe-DPA, amalungelo wemisebenzi nokudluliswa kwabantu kwaphela ngaphansi kwamasonto amabili.

retail.title: I-checkout yokuxoxa kumkhiqizo wezingubo
retail.description: Ukuqondiswa komkhiqizo, ukukhokha nokulandela ukulethwa kwenzeka ngaphakathi ku-WhatsApp kanti i-Stripe ne-PayPal zilandelela yonke i-transaction.
retail.result: Ama-playbook aqukethe ukuvumelanisa idatha yomkhiqizo, okuqukethwe kwezilimi eziningi kanye namadeshibhodi wokukhangisa.

agency.title: Isevisi ye-white-label esikalekayo
agency.description: I-ejensi yedijithali iletha ama-bot ayi-18 kumakhasimende emasontweni ayisithupha, kuhlanganise nokufaka uphawu, ama-invoice kanye namadeshibhodi e-success.
agency.result: Ama-workflow e-n8n aphindaphindwayo nama-schema e-Supabase avumela uk delivers okusheshayo kumakhasimende amaningi.

resources.title: Izinsiza ezilandiwayo ukuze uqale ngokushesha
resources.subtitle: Sibuyekeza zonke izinsiza njalo ngekota ngamaphethini amasha, ama-checklist kanye namasu okuzenzakalela.

items.title: I-playbook ye-enterprise rollout
items.description: Incwadi yesinyathelo ngesinyathelo yezinkonzo zomthetho, komkhiqizo kanye nokusebenza.
highlights: Uhlu lokuhlola lokuphatha i-WhatsApp Business API

items.title: I-compliance kit ye-GDPR & izinkokhelo
items.description: Umqulu wamadokhumenti e-TOM, izifanekiso ze-DPA kanye nezibonelo ze-invoyisi ezilungele ukusetshenziswa.
highlights: Isakhiwo se-invoyisi esihambisana nomthetho wezamabhizinisi amancane

items.title: Ama-automation recipes e-n8n & Supabase
items.description: Ukuqoqwa kwama-flows aphindaphindwayo okuphathwa kwemikhondo, ukusebenzisa ukubhalisela nokubuyisa izinkokhelo.
highlights: Uhlu lokuhlola lokuhlola izindlela ezihlukile zokukhokha

items.title: Umthombo wemiyalezo yezilimi eziningi
items.description: Amaphethini amisiwe okuqalisa, ukweseka kanye nezinkokhelo ezihunyushelwe esiJalimane, esiNgisi nesiFulentshi.

resources.assuranceSubtitle: Sabelana nge-audit trail, ama-KPI kanye nezifundo zokusetshenziswa ukuze i-WhatsApp automation isebenze ngezinga.
assurance: Ama-benchmark kuzo zombili ezempilo, ezokuthengisa ne-SaaS

testimonials.title: Kungani amaqembu ehlala ne-WhatsApp Bot Builder
testimonials.subtitle: Abaholi be-CX, ukusebenza kanye ne-compliance baxoxa nge-ROI abaqapha.

items.quote: Ama-playbook anemininingwane asisindise amasonto emvume yangaphakathi. Wonke umuntu wayazi umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku loku-1.
items.name: Leonie Hartmann

items.quote: Sisebenzise ama-recipes futhi samisa izindlela zokukhokha zamazwe amaningi ngaphandle kwekhowudi eyengeziwe.
items.name: André Becker
items.metric: Izimakethe ezine ezintsha zingakapheli izinsuku ezingu-90

items.quote: Amakhasimende ayavuma ngokushesha ngoba sinikeza imibhalo ye-compliance, amagama e-GDPR nezibonelo ze-invoyisi kusenesikhathi.
items.name: Noemi Alvarez

cta.title: Usukulungele imiphumela efana nale?
cta.subtitle: Hlela iseshini eqondisiwe noma uqale ngephakheji yezinsiza ukuze usheshise iphrojekthi yakho ye-WhatsApp.

webhooks.subtitle: Umsebenzi we-Stripe & PayPal
webhooks.empty: Azikho izigameko ze-webhook ezirekhodiwe kulesi sikhathi.

home.title: WhatsApp Bot Builder
home.subtitle: Dala ama-WhatsApp Business Bots anomusa AI ahambisana ne-DSGVO ngaphandle kwekhodi

ragDemo.title: Isibonelo esisebenzayo: RAG Chat
ragDemo.description: Engeza umthombo wolwazi (PDF noma URL) bese ukhuluma ne-AI esekelwe kulo mthombo kuphela

dsgvo.title: Ahambisana ne-DSGVO
dsgvo.description: Ukugcinwa kwedatha ye-EU, ukuphathwa kwevumelo kanye nokulalelwa okuphelele

nocode.title: Ngaphandle Kwekhodi
nocode.description: Umakhi we-bot obonakalayo one-interface yokuhudula nokulahla

caseStudies.title: Imiphumela eqinisekisiwe evela kumakhasimende
caseStudies.subtitle: Ezempilo, e-commerce namahhovisi okukhangisa asebenzisa i-WhatsApp Bot Builder ukuletha uxhaso oluqinile

healthcare.headline: Ukuhlukanisa iziguli ngokuzenzakalela enhlanganweni yezibhedlela
healthcare.description: I-bot iphendula imibuzo ephindaphindiwe, ihlele izicelo zamahlandlu futhi yehlise umthwalo wethimba lokunakekela amakhasimende.
healthcare.result: Ukumiliswa ezinsukwini eziyi-14 kufaka i-DPA, ukulawula amalungelo kanye namarekhodi okuhlola.

retail.headline: Uhambo lokuthenga olusekelwe ezingxoxweni kumkhiqizo wezingubo we-D2C
retail.description: I-WhatsApp iqondisa amakhasimende kusukela ekwelulekeni komkhiqizo kuya ekukhetheni indlela yokukhokha nokulandela kuthunyelwe ubusuku nemini.
metrics: €8.4k wemali engenayo engeziwe ngenyanga ngenxa yokuthengisa okukodwa okuzenzakalelayo
retail.result: I-Stripe, i-PayPal, i-Apple Pay ne-Klarna zisebenza ngaphandle kokungenelela kwesandla.

agency.headline: Ithuluzi le-white-label elilinganiselwayo le-ejensi yedijithali
agency.description: Ama-bot angu-18 kumakhasimende kufakwe uphawu, imibiko kanye nezinkokhelo ezihlanganisiwe phakathi namasonto ayisithupha.
metrics: Ukukhuphuka ngo-35% ekubuyiselweni kwemali ngenxa ye-SLA ezenzakalelayo
agency.result: Ukuphathwa kwamakhasimende amaningi, ukwesekwa kanye nokuhlaziywa kwenzeka kusuka ku-dashboard eyodwa.

testimonials.title: Amakhasimende akhuluma
testimonials.subtitle: AmaQembu e-CX, e-commerce ne-SaaS kuwo wonke amazwe e-EU

points.speed: Ukumiliswa kwemishini phakathi kwezinsuku ezimbalwa esikhundleni sezinyanga zokuthuthukisa
points.compliance: Uhlu lokuhlola lwe-GDPR, i-DPA namadokhumenti e-TOM atholakala
points.support: Umphathi wenkokhelo ohloniphekile kusukela ohlelweni lwe-Professional

agency.quote: Sikhiphe i-bot yekhasimende yokuqala ezinsukwini eziyi-11. Manje sithola amaphrojekthi amasha masonto onke ngaphandle kokwandisa ithimba.
agency.name: Julia Kramer

retail.quote: I-bot iphethe ukweluleka komkhiqizo, izibuyekezo zokuthumela kanye nezinkokhelo. Ithimba lethu lokweseka selinikeza isikhathi sezinto ezikhiqiza imali.
retail.name: Leonard Fischer
retail.metric: Amahora angu-18 omsebenzi wesandla agcinwe ngeviki

saas.quote: Sihlela izindlela zokungenisa amakhasimende emikhiqizweni emithathu ngesikhathi esisodwa. Inhlanganisela ye-n8n, Supabase ne-Apple Pay yenza sishintshe masinyane.
saas.name: Mira Albrecht

security.title: Ukuphepha nokuhambisana kusukela ekuqaleni
security.subtitle: Ingqalasizinda egcinwe e-EU, ukuhlolwa okuzimele kanye nemibiko ecacile
features: Ukucubungula izinkokhelo ze-PCI DSS Level 1 nge-Stripe ne-PayPal
Ukubethela kwe-TLS kusukela ekuqaleni kuya ekugcineni kanye nesitoreji esihlukile uma kudingeka
Amarekhodi okuhlola angaguquki, izimvume ezisuselwa ezindimeni kanye nokuqapha umsebenzi
assurance: Ukusingathwa e-Frankfurt (eu-central-1) okunokugcinwa kwedatha nsuku zonke
Isivumelwano sokucubungula idatha namadokhumenti e-TOM alungele ukusayina
Izivivinyo zokuphepha zekota ngayinye kanye nokuhlolwa okuqhubekayo okuzenzakalelayo

header.title: Amanani acacile
header.subtitle: Khetha uhlelo olulingana neqembu lakho. Wonke amazinga ahambisana ne-GDPR futhi agcinwa e-EU.

onboarding.title: Qalisa ngezinyathelo ezintathu
onboarding.subtitle: Umeluleki uzokuholela kusukela ekubhaliseni kuze kufike ebhotini lokuqala elibukhoma.

account.title: 1. Dala i-akhawunti futhi umeme iqembu
account.description: Bhalisa, engeza imininingwane yenkampani futhi wabele amalungelo.

connect.title: 2. Xhuma i-WhatsApp
connect.description: Khetha i-Meta Business Account, uqinisekise i-webhook bese uvula izindlela zokukhokha.

launch.title: 3. Shicilela ibhothi lokuqala
launch.description: Khetha itemplate, lungisa okuqukethwe bese ulithumela.

onboarding.footnote: Ayikho ikhadi lesikweletu elidingekayo. Zama zonke izici izinsuku ezingu-14.

roi.title: Linganisela inzuzo yakho
roi.subtitle: Bheka umthelela wokuzisebenzisela bese ukhetha izinga elifanele ngokwemibiko yakho.

help.leads: Faka wonke ama-lead e-WhatsApp, ingxoxo noma amafomu owasemukela namuhla.
help.supportTickets: Isilinganiso samathikithi okusekela eqembu lakho alulungisa mathupha njalo ngenyanga.

results.disclaimer: Lawa amanani awuqondiso — uwahlele ngokuya ngebhizinisi lakho.
results.recommendedPlanDescription: Ngemilayezo engaba ngu-{messages} ngenyanga lesi sigaba sihamba kahle kakhulu.
results.planCustom: Intengo ekhethekile iyatholakala ngokuthintana neqembu lethu.

rag.chatDescription: I-AI iphendula kuphela ngokusekelwe emithonjeni yolwazi eyengeziwe.
rag.emptyChat: Buza umbuzo ngokusekelwe emithonjeni yakho yolwazi.
rag.emptyChatHint: I-AI ingasebenzisa kuphela imininingwane evela emithonjeni eyengeziwe.

emailVerificationFailed.title: Ukuqinisekiswa Kwe-imeyili Kwehlulekile
emailVerificationFailed.description: Isixhumanisi sokuqinisekisa asisebenzi noma siphelelwe yisikhathi. Lokhu kungenzeka uma:
emailVerificationFailed.reason2: Isixhumanisi silinde isikhathi eside kakhulu (ngaphezu kwamahora angu-24)
emailVerificationFailed.resendPrompt: Ungathanda ukuthola i-imeyili entsha yokuqinisekisa ku-{email}?
emailVerificationFailed.enterEmail: Faka ikheli lakho le-imeyili ukuthola i-imeyili entsha yokuqinisekisa:
emailVerificationFailed.resendSuccessMessage: Sicela uhlole ibhokisi lakho lokungenayo ngesixhumanisi esisha sokuqinisekisa.
emailVerificationFailed.supabaseConfigMessage: Uma isixhumanisi sikhomba ku-localhost:3000, i-URL yesayithi ku-Dashboard ye-Supabase kumele iguqulwe ibe https://whatsapp.owona.de.

create.title: Dala i-bot
create.description: Qala ngokugeleza okusha noma ukhethe ithempulethi.

connect.title: Xhuma i-WhatsApp
connect.description: Xhumanisa i-akhawunti yakho ye-WhatsApp Business futhi uqinisekise i-webhook.

templates.title: Umtapo wezitemplate
templates.description: Buka izitemplate zebhizinisi bese uzingenisa ngokushesha.

bots.deleteConfirm: Ingabe ufuna ngempela ukususa le bot? Lesi sinyathelo asikwazi ukubuyiswa emuva.
bots.name: Igama le-Bot

botBuilder.dragDropHint: Hudula ama-node ku-canvas noma chofoza ukuze wengeze

support.title: Dala ithikithi lokwesekwa
support.subtitle: Chaza inkinga kafushane, ithimba lethu lizokuthintana ngokushesha.
support.disclaimer: Yonke imininingwane iphathwa ngokuya ngemithetho ye-GDPR.

statusOverview.heading: Izinyathelo ezilandelayo
statusOverview.personal: Senza izimpendulo zibe zomuntu siqu futhi sihlobise nesimo samathikithi akho amaningi.
statusOverview.escalation: Ngemva kwempendulo yakho yokuqala sithumela ithikithi ngokuzenzakalela ku-Tier 2.
statusOverview.updates: Uzothola izibuyekezo zesimo ngokushesha uma kukhona okushintshayo.

form.title: Isihloko
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Kwenzekeni? Sicela wengeze izinyathelo noma izixhumanisi ezisemqoka.
form.metadataNotice: Imininingwane yezobuchwepheshe (isiphequluli, ikhasi, isikhathi) izothunyelwa ngokuzenzakalela ukuze kusheshiswe ukuhlola.

success.title: Ithikithi lithunyelwe
success.message: Siyabonga! Ithimba lethu lizobuyela kuwe ngokushesha okukhulu.
success.nextSteps: Uzothola isiqinisekiso maduze, bese sithumela izibuyekezo njengoba ithimba le-Tier 2 liqala ukusebenza ethiketini lakho.

errors.requiredMessage: Sicela ugcwalise zonke izinkambu ezidingekayo ngaphambi kokuthumela ithikithi.
errors.submitMessage: Sicela uphinde uzame noma usithinte nge-imeyili.

inbox.title: Ibhokisi lokusekela
inbox.subtitle: Landela amathikithi akho avulekile futhi uxhumane nethimba lethu ngokushesha.
inbox.emptyDescription: Kuhle lokho! Uma kukhona okuphazamisayo, chofoza "Bika inkinga" ngezansi sizolungisa.

silentCheck.paymentStatusOk: Izinkokhelo zibukeka kahle. Akukho iphutha le-webhook elitholakele.
silentCheck.uiTraceCaptured: Sithathe i-UI trace. Ithimba lethu lizobuka imininingwane.
silentCheck.error: Ukuhlola kwehlulekile. Sicela uzame futhi kamuva.

inbox.autoEscalated: Impendulo igciniwe – ithikithi lithunyelwe ngokuzenzakalela ku-Tier 2.

company.title: WhatsApp Bot Builder
company.description: Dala ama-WhatsApp Business Bots afanele DSGVO anqhuba yi-AI ngaphandle kwekhodi. Izixazululo ze-chatbot ezingcweli zezinhlelo zakho.
company.copyright: WhatsApp Bot Builder. Wonke amalungelo agodliwe.

footer.disclaimer: Lolu hlelo lusetshenziselwa ukudala ama-WhatsApp Business chatbots. Sebenzisa ngengozi yakho.

trust.heading: Ukukhokha okuphephile
trust.subheading: Zonke izinkokhelo zivikelwe nge-Stripe no-PayPal nge-TLS engu-256-bit
items: Ukuhambisana ne-PCI DSS Level 1 kanye ne-3D Secure 2
Apple Pay, Google Pay kanye nobufakazi be-biometrics
Amarisidi nedatha yamakhasimende agcinwa e-EU ngokuhambisana ne-GDPR
trust.footerNote: Iyaphathwa yi-Stripe & PayPal – ukuvikeleka kwe-256-bit TLS
